Package application

Class Server

java.lang.Object
application.Server
public class Server extends Object
This function is used for interfacing with the system You can register yourself as a client and then research the race and the boats The employee and the users can login and perform the functions that are already permitted
Author:
Francesca Stefano mat. 306826, Antonio Signorelli mat. 306824
